title: China's New AI Regulations: What You Need to Know
title_zh: 中国新AI法规：你需要知道的内容
summary_en: The article discusses China's latest AI regulations, focusing on their impact on tech companies and AI development.
summary_zh: 文章讨论了中国最新的人工智能法规，重点关注其对科技公司和AI发展的影响。
best_quote_en: The new rules represent China's effort to balance innovation with risk control in the fast-growing AI sector.
best_quote_zh: 新规体现了中国在快速发展的AI领域平衡创新与风险控制的努力。
